1.0.name: wordpress/dbd-fire-fighter
1.0.description:
DBD Fire Fighter developed by DBD IT

This is a free plugin to decorate your website with a expert DBD Fire Fighter

Plugin Features

  • A nice animated image will add on at the top left of your wordpress site.
  • No Overflow
  • Height:250px and Width: 200px
  • Still Effect
  • Image will load from plugin directory
  • Small Size Plugins & many More

Official Plugin Site: http://developer.documentbd.com/

Special Thanks

Zamiul Islam, Md Shojol, Rasel Ahmed, DBD IT Team
